entry.string: Please enter a name for the new site
entry.translation: Pleese-a inter a neme-a fur zee noo seete

entry.string: Please enter a unique Table Prefix for this site.
entry.translation: Pleese-a inter a uneeqooe-a Teble-a Preffeex fur thees seete-a.

entry.string: Sorry, a site with domain name #(1) already exists. Please use a different site (sub)domain name
entry.translation: Surry, a seete-a veet dumeeen neme-a #(1) elreedy ixeests. Um gesh dee bork, bork! Pleese-a use-a a deefffferent seete-a (soob)dumeeen neme

entry.string: Sorry, a subsite already exists in database #(1) with database prefix #(2) Please use a different table prefix.
entry.translation: Surry, a soobseete-a elreedy ixeests in detebese-a #(1) veet detebese-a preffeex #(2) Pleese-a use-a a deefffferent teble-a preffeex.

entry.string: Unable to set configuration vars for #(1) Check your database and tables exist and try again.
entry.translation: Uneble-a tu set cunffeegooreshun fers fur #(1) Check yuoor detebese-a und tebles ixeest und try egeeen. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: The subsite folder #(1)/#(2) already exists!nRemove this subsite and recreate, or edit the exising subsite.
entry.translation: Zee soobseete-a fulder #(1)/#(2) elreedy ixeests!nRemove thees soobseete-a und recreete-a, oor ideet zee ixeesing soobseete-a.

entry.string: The subsite directory #(1)/#(2) was not created!
entry.translation: Zee soobseete-a durectury #(1)/#(2) ves nut creeted!

entry.string: The subsite var directory #(1)/#(2)/var was not created!
entry.translation: Zee soobseete-a fer durectury #(1)/#(2)/fer ves nut creeted!
